text: James Taft "Jimmer" Fredette (born February 25, 1989 in Glens Falls, New York) is an American professional basketball player. In 2014, he joined the Chicago Bulls of the National Basketball Association (NBA). ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:American Latter Day Saints Category:Chicago Bulls players Category:New Orleans Pelicans players Category:New York Knicks players Category:People from Glens Falls, New York Category:Phoenix Suns players Category:Point guards Category:Sacramento Kings players Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from New York (state)
title: Jimmer Fredette
